equipment.name: Demonblade
base_affixes: Critical Strikes with <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills increase your Attack Speed by <text class='c_random'>33.6%</text> for <text class='c_number'>7</text> seconds.
+14% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills

equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +20.25% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Sovereign Mail
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>6.96</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>135</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Golem</text> has a <text class='c_random'>6.93%</text> chance to reduce its active Cooldown by <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds and a <text class='c_random'>1.5</text> chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging enemies with <text class='c_important'>Sever</text> has a <text class='c_random'>27.04%</text> chance to spawn a pool of <text class='c_important'>Blight</text> under the target that deals <text class='c_random'>108.17%</text> bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>4.2</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a <text class='c_number'>14%</text> chance to generate <text class='c_random'>58.37</text> Essence when hitting a <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> enemy.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
base_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.64%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>98.61%</text>.
+21% Damage for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite

equipment.name: Amulet
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>48.52%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
6.24% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
+(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Death's Reach Passive

equipment.name: Adventurer's Helm
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.

equipment.name: Mother's Embrace
base_affixes: If a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill hits <text class='c_number'>6</text> or more enemies, <text class='c_random'>49.63%</text> of the Resource cost is refunded.

equipment.name: Warlord Boots
base_affixes: +30% Movement Speed for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.
added_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>3</text>.
